title: Visual Voicemail tab missing in phone app
content: On my Pixel 1 phone, I do not have a voicemail tab in the phone app. If I uninstall updates to the app, I do get the voicemail tab and it works perfectly. Updating it again removes it and the setting for visual voicemail in the settings. In the past, I have resorted to using Google Voice for my voicemail, but I would like to be able to use the built-in one. If it matters, my carrier is Family Mobile, which has no native visual voicemail app that could be conflicting. And, like I said, it works perfectly before updating. Was this feature removed to am I missing something? Any help would be greatly appreciated..
